short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Completely free and open source Chrome AI Grammar Check Extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- Completely free. No subscriptions required. No ads.
- Absolutely safe. AI works on your machine. No data sent to the internet.
- Smart grammar check. Checks full sentences, not only individual words.
- You can use local instance of Llama server

Installation instructions: https://github.com/nucleartux/ai-grammar?tab=readme-ov-file#installing
